body: When a filter is applied to the explorer/editor card pool should add some sort of visual indication such as highlighting the filter button in some way.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Add indicator that a filter has been set.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on August 21, 2014 14:36:41_

When a filter is applied to the explorer/editor card pool should add some sort of visual indication such as highlighting the filter button in some way.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=660_
